mapper.sql: device_id, operate_user_id, transcribe_user_id, project_id, intermediary_id, device_production_num, device_status, device_location_x, device_location_y, device_create_time, device_update_time, manufacturer_id, user_name, `password`, device_type
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from device
order by ${orderByClause}

select d.*,u1.userid o_user_id,u1.name o_user_name,u2.userid t_user_id,u2.name t_user_name from device d LEFT JOIN dingtalk_user u1 ON d.operate_user_id = u1.userid LEFT JOIN dingtalk_user u2 ON d.transcribe_user_id = u2.userid LEFT JOIN project p ON d.project_id = p.project_id where d.device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into device (intermediary_id, device_production_num, device_status,valid) values ( #{intermediary.intermediaryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deviceProductionNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deviceStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{valid,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into device
device_id,
operate_user_id,
transcribe_user_id,
project_id,
intermediary_id,
device_production_num,
device_status,
device_location_x,
device_location_y,
device_create_time,
device_update_time,
manufacturer_id,
user_name,
`password`,
device_type,

mapper.update:
update device
device_id = #{record.deviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
operate_user_id = #{record.operateUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
transcribe_user_id = #{record.transcribeUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
project_id = #{record.projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
intermediary_id = #{record.intermediaryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
device_production_num = #{record.deviceProductionNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_status = #{record.deviceStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
device_location_x = #{record.deviceLocationX,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_location_y = #{record.deviceLocationY,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_create_time = #{record.deviceCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
device_update_time = #{record.deviceUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
manufacturer_id = #{record.manufacturerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_name = #{record.userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`password` = #{record.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_type = #{record.deviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update device set device_id = #{record.deviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, operate_user_id = #{record.operateUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, transcribe_user_id = #{record.transcribeUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, project_id = #{record.projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, intermediary_id = #{record.intermediaryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, device_production_num = #{record.deviceProductionNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_status = #{record.deviceStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, device_location_x = #{record.deviceLocationX,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_location_y = #{record.deviceLocationY,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_create_time = #{record.deviceCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, device_update_time = #{record.deviceUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, manufacturer_id = #{record.manufacturerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_name = #{record.userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `password` = #{record.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_type = #{record.deviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update device
operate_user_id = #{operateUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
transcribe_user_id = #{transcribeUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
intermediary_id = #{intermediaryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
device_production_num = #{deviceProductionNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_status = #{deviceStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
device_location_x = #{deviceLocationX,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_location_y = #{deviceLocationY,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_create_time = #{deviceCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
device_update_time = #{deviceUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
manufacturer_id = #{manufacturerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_type = #{deviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select d.*,operateUser.userid o_user_id,operateUser.name o_user_name,transcribeUser.userid t_user_id,transcribeUser.name t_user_name from device d LEFT JOIN dingtalk_user operateUser ON d.operate_user_id = operateUser.userid LEFT JOIN dingtalk_user transcribeUser ON d.transcribe_user_id = transcribeUser.userid LEFT JOIN project project ON d.project_id = project.project_id WHERE 1=1 and d.device_production_num LIKE CONCAT('%',#{deviceProductionNum},'%')
and project.project_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{project.projectName},'%')
and operateUser.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{operateUser.name},'%')
and transcribeUser.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{transcribeUser.name},'%')

select d.*,operateUser.userid o_user_id,operateUser.name o_user_name,transcribeUser.userid t_user_id,transcribeUser.name t_user_name from device d LEFT JOIN dingtalk_user operateUser ON d.operate_user_id = operateUser.userid LEFT JOIN dingtalk_user transcribeUser ON d.transcribe_user_id = transcribeUser.userid LEFT JOIN project p ON d.project_id = p.project_id WHERE p.project_id = #{0}
SELECT * FROM device WHERE device_location_x !='' and device.device_location_y !='' and device.intermediary_id = #{0}
